graph_title: Adopted children by social groups (aged 0-17 years)
indicator_name: Adopted children by social groups (aged 0-17 years)
national_indicator_description: The indicator of adopted children by social groups (0-17 years old) is the number of adopted children by social groups and gender and share from the total number of adopted children
computation_calculations: Number of adopted children by social groups and their ratio to adopted children.
source_organisation_2: Ministry of Labour and Social Affaires of RA
